question: For this question use Performance Manual CAP 698 SEP 1 Figure 2.3. Using the climb performance chart, for the single engine aeroplane, determine the ground distance to reach a height of 1,500 ft in the following conditions: Given:- O.A.T at Take-off : ISA, Airport pressure altitude: 5,000 ft, Aeroplane mass: 3,300 Ibs, Speed: 100 KIAS, Wind component: 5 kts Tailwind.
subject: Performance
